name: City builder/Idle game prototype
description:
Prototype for a City Builder mixed with Idle mechanics. There are bugs, and several of the systems aren't properly connected/setup yet (primarily the Research tab), as well as a handful of subsystems and math broke when it was moved over to the latest version of Godot, but most of it is working again

Controls for the demo: 

  • Left mouse button to interact and place buildings
  • Right mouse button to remove buildings (when placement marker is visible)
  • W,A,S,D keys for moving around the map (Space bar increases the speed)

NOTE: You can activate the placement marker by clicking on a building in the buildings tab, and remove it by Right Clicking an empty tile on the map

Tools used:

  • (Art) Clip Studio Paint
  • (Art) Pyxel Edit
  • (Game Engine) Godot

Assets and prototype are available:

Assets download

  • ~10 Tiles
  • ~15 Buildings
  • ~30 GUI elements
  • 3 Backgrounds

Prototype download

  • 1 Godot prototype game folder

License for the download:

  •  You may use and modify the contents to your needs for commercial and non-commercial projects, just don't redistribute, repackage or sell the asset pack, assets, code or prototype by themselves
  •  Credit is not required, but always greatly appreciated!
